name: Collared
note:
<Category: Bypass Recover All Removal>
<Help Description>
Your Master has activated your collar. You now 
have no choice but to obey her every command.
</Help Description>
<Custom Turn Start Effect>
  // Get the landing skill.
  var skill = 1;
  var order = $gameVariables.value(699)
  if (order == 0) {
    if (user.currentClass().id == 5) {
      skill = 4;
    } else if (user.currentClass().id == 3 || user.currentClass().id == 48) {
      skill = 848;
    }
  } else if (order == 1) {
    if (user.currentClass().id == 3) {
      skill = 42;
    } else if (user.currentClass().id == 5) {
      skill = 88;
    } else if (user.currentClass().id == 9) {
      skill = 348;
    } else {
      skill = 2;
    }
  } else if (order == 2) {
    skill = 15;
  }
  // Get the last targeted index.
  var target = -1;
  // Queue the forced action.
  BattleManager.queueForceAction(user, skill, target);
</Custom Turn Start Effect>

name: -Raving-
note:
<Custom Turn Start Effect>
  // Get the landing skill.
  var skill = 1092;
  // Get a valid random target.
  var party = $gameParty.aliveMembers();
  var invalid = party.indexOf(user);
  var target = Math.floor(Math.random()*party.length);
  if (target == invalid) {
    if (target < party.length - 1) {
      target = target + 1;
    } else if (target > 0) {
      target = target - 1;
    }
  }
  if (target != invalid) {
    // Queue the forced action.
    BattleManager.queueForceAction(user, skill, target);
  }
</Custom Turn Start Effect>

    condition = false;
  } else {
    condition = true;
  }
</Custom Passive Condition>
<Custom Respond Effect>
  if (this.isHpEffect() && value > 0) {
    user.startAnimation(339);
    var spike = parseInt(value * 0.1);
    user.gainHp(-spike);
    user.startDamagePopup();
    user.clearResult();
  }
</Custom Respond Effect>
